title: CISA warns govt agencies to patch actively exploited Android driver
description: CISA ordered federal agencies today to patch a high-severity Arm Mali GPU kernel driver privilege escalation flaw added to its list of actively exploited vulnerabilities and addressed with this month's Android security updates. [...]

title: Critical TootRoot bug lets attackers hijack Mastodon servers
description: Mastodon, the free and open-source decentralized social networking platform, has patched four vulnerabilities, including a critical one that allows hackers to create arbitrary files on instance-hosting servers using specially crafted media files. [...]

title: Barracuda working on fix for ongoing Email Gateway login issues
description: Email and network security firm Barracuda is working to fix an ongoing issue that triggers invalid login errors and prevents Email Gateway Defense users from signing into their accounts. [...]

title: The Need for Risk-Based Vulnerability Management to Combat Threats
description: Risk-based vulnerability management platforms are better equipped to help orgs prioritize threats for mitigation and ensure complete security. Learn more from Outpost24 about risk-based vulnerability management. [...]

title: MOVEit Transfer customers warned to patch new critical flaw
description: MOVEit Transfer, the software at the center of the recent massive spree of Clop ransomware breaches, has received an update that fixes a critical-severity SQL injection bug and two other less severe vulnerabilities. [...]
